name: Frogs Can Ski: The Incredible Winter Creature First Snow Day - Free
name_original: Frogs Can Ski: The Incredible Winter Creature First Snow Day - Free
description:
Did you know that Frogs can Ski ?

Yes it's winter, yes the frogs don't like when it's too cold, but this frog don't mind the frosty ice air of the mountain. It's not just for fun that the amphibian is out there, there's a lot of shiny gold coins lying everywhere, try to pick up as many as you can !!

But be careful, a giant kind of cactus is all over the mountain, they seem to be frost resistant, so they have all their pointy needles ready to hurt you. But no worries it's not to hard to jump all over them and have a fun outside day !

DOWNLOAD FROG CAN SKI for FREE now !
